;;;73     
;;;74     void arm_lms_init_q15(
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;75       arm_lms_instance_q15 * S,
;;;76       uint16_t numTaps,
;;;77       q15_t * pCoeffs,
;;;78       q15_t * pState,
;;;79       q15_t mu,
;;;80       uint32_t blockSize,
;;;81       uint32_t postShift)
;;;82     {
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000006  e9dd0607          LDRD     r0,r6,[sp,#0x1c]
;;;83       /* Assign filter taps */
;;;84       S->numTaps = numTaps;
00000a  9f06              LDR      r7,[sp,#0x18]
00000c  8021              STRH     r1,[r4,#0]
;;;85     
;;;86       /* Assign coefficient pointer */
;;;87       S->pCoeffs = pCoeffs;
;;;88     
;;;89       /* Clear state buffer and size is always blockSize + numTaps - 1 */
;;;90       memset(pState, 0, (numTaps + (blockSize - 1u)) * sizeof(q15_t));
00000e  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
000010  0041              LSLS     r1,r0,#1
000012  461d              MOV      r5,r3                 ;82
000014  4618              MOV      r0,r3
000016  1e89              SUBS     r1,r1,#2
000018  60a2              STR      r2,[r4,#8]
00001a  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memclr
;;;91     
;;;92       /* Assign state pointer */
;;;93       S->pState = pState;
;;;94     
;;;95       /* Assign Step size value */
;;;96       S->mu = mu;
00001e  6065              STR      r5,[r4,#4]
000020  81a7              STRH     r7,[r4,#0xc]
;;;97     
;;;98       /* Assign postShift value to be applied */
;;;99       S->postShift = postShift;
000022  6126              STR      r6,[r4,#0x10]
;;;100    
;;;101    }
000024  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;102    
                          ENDP
